name: MDRLabs-Pipeline-Resource-Distribution
description: Add or update one or more Azure DevOps Task Groups, Variable Groups and Service Connections to one or more Azure DevOps Team Projects

scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && rimraf ./built && rimraf ./ProductTasks/**/Common && rimraf ./ProductTasks/**/ps_modules && rimraf ./ProductTasks/**/Modules && rimraf ./ProductTasks/**/bin
scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.build:all: npm run build:tasks && npm run extension:create
scripts.extension:publish: tfx extension publish --root . --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version --token %npm_config_ado_pat% --publisher %Publisher% --share-with %ADOAccount% --override "{\"name\":\"MDRLabs Distribute Pipeline Resources "("%ADOExtensionDeveloper%")\"}"
